item.title: ‘Sacrifice’ Review: Chris Evans and Anya Taylor-Joy Go on a Confused Cult Quest in Romain Gavras’ Ambitious but Erratic Eat-the-Rich Thriller
item.description: Salma Hayek Pinault, Vincent Cassel, John Malkovich and Charli xcx also appear in this film about a confrontation between celebrities and eco-terrorists at an environmental fundraiser.
